title: teemo and aram
body:
Okay, teemo is op on aram. you either buy oracles every so often (and use up gold) or you die to the enemy due to slow and poison.

Bring back lightbringer and hextech sweeper ... or nerf the time on shrooms in h.a. to 20 seconds duration before they go away.

Or...

Buy MR like a smart player. I'm pretty sure the vendor has some stuff around... {{item:3065}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3102}}

shhh, dont tell them that, I like to get kills as ap teemo in aram.

Want to hear a secret? *Whispers to your hear.*

I want these fuck nuggets to learn to counter me instead of raging like morons... It's that attitude that made Demon Teemo, one of the worse skins in League exist in the first place.

I play teemo all the time. He is one of my fav champions. But even with not being able to use shrooms as a minefield, he is very powerful. Back when lightbringer and hextech sweeper were still around, I'd still run through other teams.

But without those he is just *too* op.
hes so easy to kill tho dont run from him engage hes squishy

a single item buy does next to nothing against teemo shrooms. he will still easily burn down a good part of your hp with each one, and having them packed in to that single-lane map is beyond obnoxious where it can become difficult to even want to take a step forward later in the game.

Lightbringer added AD, crit and visibility. It made it so that if you ran into a shroom it was your own fault. Hextech sweeper added armor instead of AD and still gave visibility. They had utility and lasted essentially forever.

Nothing should completely eliminate them ... there are plenty of champions that have an ult that can't really be stopped once cast ... shrooms can. So having a lightbringer would make it possible for you to *see* if there was a shroom waiting for you to step on (and give you other stats as well).

one should not HAVE to buy a specific item to counter just ONE champ on the enemy team.

Plus neither of these two items has any magic resist....
imagine the enemy team is pretty much all magic damage and you buy an item to counter teemo.... you're not gona buy the lightbringet, you'd go for the sweeper, and yet that has armor and no MR

and even if you say these items counter teemo shrooms, teemo is not the only one on the enemy team, and that sweeper will do next to nothing in helping you actually fight teemo face to face. Whoever gets these anti invis items is most likely going to have to be near the front to sweep where they will be most vulnerable, not hiding behind their team.
Teemo all around is just annoying, people like to say he's balanced, when he has the highest movespeed base and a move speed steroid allowing him to kite and do ap burst damage. It's rediculous.

And the **Cancerous shrooms** never forget them
I truly believe he gets too many for a short amount of time, by the time lvl 7 or 8 hits, his lane has 6 or so mushrooms, all scaling AP damage and a slow, while being invisible. It's dumb.
